title: Cartoon Network (British and Irish TV channel)
summary: Cartoon Network (commonly abbreviated as CN) is a British pay television channel aimed at children which airs animated programming targeting children aged 7 to 15.[9][10] It is run by WarnerMedia International for localisation strategy for international markets (such as the UK) and in conjunction with Warner Bros. Global Kids, Young Adults and Classics for the production of content and global leadership of the Cartoon Network brand.[11]
